text: "Rough Boy" is a 1986 song by ZZ Top and is the third single from their ninth studio album Afterburner. It went to number 12 in Poland, number 22 in France and the United States, number 23 in the United Kingdom and number 38 in Switzerland. Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:ZZ Top songs
title: Rough Boy
